pros: Working here is like working with family. I look forward to coming into work and I feel like i make a difference. If we can help one patient have a better day, it is worth it to me.
cons: I haven't found any downsides here. As with all companies, I think that improvements are needed. All businesses need to continue in a growth perios.

pros: Great team. Good staffing. Friendly management.
cons: Outdated system. Hard to find resources

pros: Coworkers are great! The people outside of leadership are what keep most of us there. Benefits for the most part are decent and affordable.
cons: The CNO lacks common sense and good judgement. Nursing managers are prejudice and favor particular people. Leadership has no clue and all they do is bark orders and micromanage. Even if it’s illegal, as long as they will make a buck, senior leaders force you to do it. There’s a reason that Baylor Scott & White Health no longer are part of this facility.
